step.cmd: If the psql client is not in the path, specify its location: sqitch config --user engine.pg.client /usr/local/pgsql/bin/psql
This command sets the PostgreSQL client for all Sqitch projects you manage on your host.
To configure this setting for all accounts on your host, run: sqitch config --system engine.pg.client /usr/local/pgsql/bin/psql
This will add the values to the global Sqitch configuration file located at sqitch --etc-path/sqitch.conf.
